page.title: 02POPULATION
page.content:
During 1984 the population of Glenprosn increased due to a change from some cottages being occupied as holiday homes to full occupation. As at May 1985, the population of the whole Glen is 87 people. There are 25 families. The average size of family is 3.5 There are 13 pre school age children. There are 16 primary school age and 8 secondery school age children. There are 9 old age pensioners. The average age of the people in the Glen is therefore very young. In the small inhabited area of our Domesday patch live 27 people.
During the past 13 years the Rev.D. Leadbeater has christened 8 children, married 3 couples and held 3 funerals in Glenprosen Church.
